summary: The MacBook Pro is a high-performance laptop made by Apple. It's like a more powerful version of the MacBook Air. This computer has a 14-inch or 16-inch screen and uses Apple's own chips, called M-series. In the past, it used Intel chips. It was the first Apple laptop to use these Intel processors and to have the 'MacBook' name. The MacBook Pro is a popular choice for professionals who need a powerful computer for work or creative tasks.
title: MacBook Pro
